full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of hotel accommodations in support of the PRECISE RESPONSE Exercise. The solicitation is open to all Hotel Accommodations and Support Services located in Medicine Hat, Alberta.

**Notice Details**

| **Notice ID** | **N/A** |
| --- | --- |
| **Notice Reference** | W0107-24-TW001/A |
| **Publication Date** | May 28, 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | June 12, 2024, 14:00:00 (CST) (Expired) |
| **Regions** | Alberta |

**Notice Objective**
The intent of this solicitation is to establish up to one (1) contract for the planned period of July 2, 2024, to July 30, 2024. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing hotel accommodations for the duration of the exercise.

**Non-Mandatory Requirements**
No security requirements are associated with this contract. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contracting Authority**
Name: Kayla Shabsove
Email: [kayla.shabsove@forces.gc.ca](mailto:kayla.shabsove@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 596-9352

**Tender Description**
This RFP requires the provision of hotel accommodations in Medicine Hat, Alberta. Interested bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the bid solicitation.

**RFP Documents**

* [w0107-24-tw001-rfp-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39024/w0107-24-tw001-rfp-en.pdf) (English)
